radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis; subtly nodular liver appearance with caudate lobe hypertrophy; irregular portal vein branches; no intrahepatic biliary dilatation; enlarged spleen; 18 x 9 mm nodule in left adrenal gland compatible with adenoma; mildly delayed contrast excretion on right kidney; mild hydronephrosis and perinephric stranding; 3 mm stone in distal ureter; unremarkable bladder and rectum; fibroid suggested at uterus; sigmoid diverticulosis and thickened sigmoid wall; mild fat stranding and small free fluid in pelvis; mild degenerative changes at T11-12; grade 1 anterolisthesis of L5 on S1.
